name: Troll Face Clicker!
description:
~Troll Face Clicker!~     

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

    ~About Game~  
  • Click the troll face to gain "TROLLS" (In-game currency).
  •  Buy all sorts of wacky trolls in the shop to increase your "TROLLS".
  • The "BASIC" part of the shop includes trolls that increase your click rate.
  • The "Advanced" part of the shop includes trolls that increase your trolls per second rate .
  • Don't forget about the world record that is seen at the bottom left corner of the screen! Can you beat it?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    ~Credits & Links~
  • Music by AwwEsOmEfAcE. Check out their music on Scratch!: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/51264134/
  • All art and code made by me in Scratch!
  • Learn more about me here!: https://resite.link/KrazyKernel

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                        ~Bonus~                  
  •         Everytime you buy a new troll, the skin changes on the main screen! Try it out!
  •          This was my first ever project on Scratch! I just copy and pasted a bunch of code to be honest because I wanted to share a project so badly lol :/
  •              Don't forget to follow me and leave any feedback  on the games I make! Peace!
